subtitle: every one of us is blessed
with unique talents and skills
some of us are more cerebral
others more emotional some more creative
others more implement oriented execution
the list goes on very different talents
some people good with their hands
musical writers some people
are people people some people are more
back end
each skill and talent tells you
something about yourself
and that too has divine sparks spiritual
opportunities
how are you using these skills so let's
revisit
our uniqueness i remember speaking once
i was a keynote speaker at a medical
conference now i'm not a doctor i'm not
the son of a doctor what was i doing
there
a few of the doctors knew me and they
had heard a talk i had given
they wanted me to present what is the
medicine of the future going to look
like
somewhat of a spiritual take but also
in some ways practical so i presented
briefly i explained that all
disease and illness and the death god
forbid
are all a result of dissonance of a
disconnect
and schism between body and soul because
the soul has infinite amount of energy
it doesn't run out of gas
so why can't it coexist with the body
forever is because the body like an
appliance
ages wears down gets drained
weakens body parts different parts and
at some point it can no longer
contain the life force of the soul
but imagine the body could be
revitalized
so it would be like a cup why would the
water ever run out of the cup
and therefore i said death illness
disease is an aberration
there will be a day when we'll be able
to have body and soul together so a
doctor gets up and asks the question so
what will be our job
then as i said your job will be the most
wonderful one because of your intimate
knowledge of the human anatomy and
biology and chemistry
and physiology and neurology and so on
you will teach us the secrets of the
divine
that are embedded in the human body for
my flesh i behold god
so instead of fighting pain and
suffering and death you will teach us
the deeper meaning and the lessons in
our lives we learn from the
physical structure of the human body and
its
systems as an astral astronomer
will teach us that from the stars and
the cosmos
and a physicist will teach it to us from
the subatomic particles
within all of existence each of us has a
skill
each of us have talents look at it
and see what deeper thing what deeper
lesson
in life can you teach yourself your
family others
from the skill and talent that you have
you
